snippet: The photographer Albert Vecerka’s images tell the story of a block, like Malcolm X Boulevard between 124th and 125th Streets, through its architecture.
abstract: Photographer Albert Vecerka has spent two decades documenting changing Harlem as evidenced by disappearance of old buildings and construction of new ones there.
lead_paragraph: The photographer Albert Vecerka’s images tell the story of a block, like Malcolm X Boulevard between 124th and 125th Streets, through its architecture.

headline.main: How Harlem Has Changed: Photographs by Albert Vecerka
